full_description:
PC Power PCM22F 21.45" IPS FHD 75Hz Borderless Monitor

The PC Power PCM22F is a 21.45" IPS FHD monitor that blends a stylish design with modern technologies to provide an exceptional visual experience. With the 21.45-inch IPS Full HD display, you can immerse yourself in spectacular pictures and realistic colors for a better viewing experience. The monitor has a refresh rate of 75Hz, which ensures smooth and responsive performance, making it suitable for both work and enjoyment. Motion blur is greatly minimized with a 5ms GTG (Gray-to-Gray) reaction time, making it suited for fast-paced material such as gaming or action-packed videos. The PCM22F monitor delivers an immersive viewing experience with a borderless design and a sleek 2mm bezel, letting you focus solely on your material without interruptions. Eye-care technologies, such as Blue Light Shift and Flicker-Free, encourage pleasant viewing over long periods by minimizing eye strain and tiredness. The PCM22F monitor has built-in 2W/4 speakers for audiophiles, offering clean and crisp audio without the need for additional devices. This simplifies your setup and streamlines your multimedia experience. With HDMI and VGA connections, connectivity is made adaptable, enabling compatibility with a broad range of devices, from laptops to game consoles. Whether you're working, gaming, or watching movies, the PCM22F smoothly adjusts to your demands. The PC Power PCM22F monitor is energy-efficient, requiring less than 24W of power when in use and less than 0.5W when shut off. This not only decreases your environmental impact but also helps to cut your energy expenditures over time.

full_description:
PC Power PCGM22U 21.5" IPS FHD 100Hz Borderless Gaming Monitor

The PC Power PCGM22U 21.5" IPS FHD 100Hz Borderless Gaming Monitor was precisely engineered to provide an unrivaled visual and gaming experience. The PC Power PCGM22U monitor's Full HD resolution of 1920×1080 provides exceptional clarity and accuracy, ideal for immersive gaming, detailed work, and high-definition video consumption. The IPS (In-Plane Switching) technology delivers constant and realistic colors from every viewing angle, resulting in rich and lifelike pictures whether you're looking from the side or straight in front. The PCGM22U's 100Hz refresh rate is a notable feature, as it improves motion fluidity while decreasing latency and ghosting for a smooth and responsive gaming experience.With a speedy 5ms reaction rate, this PC Power PCGM22U monitor is ideal for fast-paced action games, displaying every movement and change without delay. The PCGM22U monitor's borderless design enhances screen space, providing an immersive viewing experience suitable for multi-monitor installations. This design not only improves the aesthetics of your workstation or gaming station, but it also enables a smooth multi-monitor experience with little bezel interruptions. The PCGM22U has both HDMI and VGA connections for connectivity, making it compatible with a broad range of devices such as PCs, laptops, game consoles, and more. The presence of a 3.5mm audio port allows for more audio output options, such as wearing headphones for a private gaming session or connecting to external speakers for a more immersive sound experience. The display of PC Power PCGM22U has built-in speakers, which provide convenient audio without the need for additional accessories. The PCGM22U is also VESA mountable, offering customers the option of mounting the monitor on a wall or an adjustable arm, maximizing desk space and allowing for specific viewing angles. Eye-care technology, such as flicker-free backlighting and a blue light filter, helps to decrease eye strain and tiredness during prolonged usage, making it an ideal choice for lengthy gaming sessions, workdays, or movie marathons. The PC Power PCGM22U 21.5" IPS FHD 100Hz Borderless Gaming Monitor offers great performance, a sleek design, and user-friendly features, making it an excellent choice for gamers and multimedia fans looking for high-quality graphics and a comfortable viewing experience.
